CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By addition of 1% 1,8-diiodooctane ( DIO ) into o-DCB used for spin - coating , the PCEs of the solar cells based on PzNDTDTBT or PzNDTDTBO were improved to 3.22 and 4.63% , respectively , mostly through an increase in the FF.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 1,8-diiodooctane (DIO) |
| o-DCB |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |

The material names identified in the paragraph are: 1,8-diiodooctane (DIO), o-DCB, PzNDTDTBT, and PzNDTDTBO.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 1,8-diiodooctane (DIO) |
| o-DCB |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear material names mentioned are 1,8-diiodooctane (DIO) and o-DCB. The other names, PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO, are mentioned in the context of the solar cells based on them, but they are not explicitly identified as materials in the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By addition of 1% 1,8-diiodooctane ( DIO ) into o-DCB used for spin - coating , the PCEs of the solar cells based on PzNDTDTBT or PzNDTDTBO were improved to 3.22 and 4.63% , respectively , mostly through an increase in the FF.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 1% |
| 1,8-diiodooctane (DIO) |
| o-DCB |
| PCEs |
| 3.22% |
| 4.63% |
| FF |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCEs |
| FF |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |

Explanation:

* "1%" and "3.22%", "4.63%" are not material properties, they are percentages.
* "1,8-diiodooctane (DIO)" and "o-DCB" are solvents and not material properties.
* "PCEs" (Power Conversion Efficiency) and "FF" (Fill Factor) are material properties.
* "PzNDTDTBT" and "PzNDTDTBO" are organic semiconductors and are material properties.
